      public ArrayList<MyPosition> possibleMoves(boardCopy board, boolean noRetritRule)
      Description copied from class: MoveablePiece
      This function calculates all the legal moves a MovablePiece can make.

      this method is not abstract because all but one movable piece can move the same so that piece an overwrite it.
